name: market for cement, Portland | cement, Portland | Cutoff, U
description:
ecoQuery: https://ecoquery.ecoinvent.org/3.10/cutoff/dataset/29806/documentation

This is a market activity. Each market represents the consumption mix of a product in a given geography, connecting suppliers with consumers of the same product in the same geographical area. Markets group the producers and also the imports of the product (if relevant) within the same geographical area. They also account for transport to the consumer and for the losses during that process, when relevant.;This market represents Portland cement in Tunisia, delivered to the consumption point. The cement manufacturer estimates that the average transport distances of cement were 41 km for the local market, The data represent 15% of the cement marketing for construction activities in Tunisia.;This market activity only includes the internal transport of cement produced in Tunisia, which represents 53.4% of the total production. The remaining 46.6% that is exported is not accounted in this dataset.

Bulk cement, from cement storage in silos at the cement plant to cement storage in silos at concrete plants.

It ends with cement storage in silos at concrete plant. It only includes data for transport distribution. Infrastructure, energy, maintenance not included.
category: C:Manufacturing/23:Manufacture of other non-metallic mineral products/239:Manufacture of non-metallic mineral products n.e.c./2394:Manufacture of cement, lime and plaster

processDocumentation.timeDescription: Time period was set identical to the corresponding transformation activity.
processDocumentation.geographyDescription: This activity represents the market for cement for Tunisia.  Such market activities involve the distribution of a product from its supplier to the consumer within a specific geographical region. As part of this market activity, transportation is also included, and the distances covered are given by the cement manufacturer.

exchanges.description: Total transport distance is 41 km for local market. The distance, the size and the EURO classification of lorry was informed by the cement manufacturer.
